price: ߥߟߊ߫ ߒ߬ ߣߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߛߐ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߟߍߙߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߟߴߊ߬ ߢߍ߫ ߞߘߐ߬ߡߊ߲߫ ߓߊ߬ ߸ ߣߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߓߟߏߘߐߡߌ߬ߘߊ߬ߣߍ߲߫ ߏ߬ ߟߊ߫؟
arabic: أَمۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ كِتَٰبٗا مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦ فَهُم بِهِۦ مُسۡتَمۡسِكُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: am ātaynāhum kitāban min qablihi fahum bihi mus'tamsikūna
